scenario.name: Group Call Client 2
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 [last_to] [last_from] [last_Call-ID:] [last_cseq] User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0
